sources.title: When the Bough Breaks
sources.description: Title: When the Bough Breaks Summary: Emotional strains of adoption. A young mother hands over her baby to foster parents, but struggles to let go emotionally. Her obsession affects the lives of those around her, including the child. Directed by: Lawrence Huntington Actors: Patricia Roc, Rosamund John, Bill Owen Production Company: Sydney Box Productions Release Date: 1948 (Austria) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Emotional strains of adoption. A young mother hands over her baby to foster parents, but struggles to let go emotionally. Her obsession affects the lives of those around her, including the child.
